alert.note: Alert for Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 3:22PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Broomfield, northwestern Adams and southeastern Boulder Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 321 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Niwot, or 24 miles northwest of Denver, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor plants is possible. Locations impacted include... Northwestern Thornton, northeastern Westminster, southeastern Boulder, southwestern Longmont, Broomfield, northern Northglenn, Lafayette, Louisville, Erie, Superior, Dacono, Eldorado Springs, Niwot and Todd Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter and move inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boulder And Jefferson Counties Below 6000 Feet, West Broomfield County; Central and South Weld County; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
